description: The dual-SIM device Samsung Galaxy M10 runs on Android 8.0 Oreo and sports a 6.22-inch HD+ (720×1520 pixels) Infinity V Display with a 19:9 aspect ratio. The device is powered by an Exynos 7870 1.6 GHz 14 nm Octa-core processor, coupled with 2GB of RAM and 16GB of inbuilt storage which is expandable up to 512GB via microSD card. The Galaxy M10 features a dual-camera setup at the rear, comprised of a 13-megapixel main sensor with an f/1.9 aperture, a 5-megapixel secondary sensor with an f/2.2 aperture and also comes with the Live Focus feature. The second camera enables 120-degree ultra-wide angle photography and can be selected through the camera app on the smartphone. Just fire up the 5MP Front Camera for lit selfies on your social feed with the In-Display Flash, selfie focus mode and f/2.0 aperture. The amazing M10 is available in two different colors. Charcoal Black, Ocean Blue. This device is unstoppable with 3,400 mAh battery under the hood and has an accelerometer, proximity sensor, virtual light sensor alongside Fast Face Unlock feature to unlock your phone quickly. related release Samsung Galaxy M20 and Samsung Galaxy M30 smartphone.

description: The unofficial price of Xiaomi Mi 9 is BDT 31,000. Xiaomi Mi 9 comes with some amazing features like Device Maintenance, Palm selfie, Wide selfie, Beauty mode, Quick launch, Selfie flash, Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor under Display, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor. It is a Dual-SIM smartphone with 4G technology. The Mi 9 is available in Black, Blue, White and Gold colors. It has a 6.39 inch Super AMOLED display with 1080 x 2340 resolution. In the camera section, 48 MP, 16 MP and TOF Triple camera are on the back with 1.8 aperture. On the front, there is a 24 MP camera with selfie focus. It is powered by a 3300 mAh battery which keeps the Qualcomm SDM855 Snapdragon 855 processor running and for a smooth performance a 6/8 GB RAM and 128/256 GB ROM is available now.
